content: #81793 is a small improvement which i would really like to see stabilized. I nominated the issue more than a month ago but afaict it was never reached in a triage meeting. As I assume this to be both fairly trivial and uncontroversial, is it possible to deal with this outside of a @T-lang meeting and start an fcp?
It's been discussed briefly a few times -- I even seem to recall an action item but not seeing it now -- the next step here is likely a stabilization report
which e.g. motivates the changes in the rules, explains how users might (or might not) observe them, whether there's future compatibility concern (do we lose anything by doing this?)

likely a stabilization report

i don't think a stabilization report adds much value here tbh
